name: Enumerations naming convention - case and character set control
description: Names of Enumerations should start with an uppercase character and should not include any underscore
output:
This report lists all Enumerations with first letter not in uppercase or having an underscore.
It provides the following information:
  Enumeration full name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected
reference: "Use Pascal case for Enum types and value names"  : https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-1.1/4x252001(v=vs.71)
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
alternativeName: Enumerations naming convention - case and character set control
